post.body: i hear it turns your poop bright green!
thanks for summing up your day. wow is twitter life changing!
is glad he finally made it home from a 3 hour nightmare from snowy roads. BTW...TN people can't drive!
is getting ready to head home. Good work today everyone!
is apologizing to both men and woman for his role in the Winter Retreat promo video!
is going to get his work done today. It had to happen sometime.
is checking his email while Caylem play with He-Man toys as old as his dad.
is glad filming for Winter Retreat promo vids is over! I couldn't wear those boots any longer.
is trying to work out his calendar for the next 4 months.
is going to bed relatively early.
is waking up from a Sunday nap.
is home from the Student Ministry Christmas Party.
is trying to focus on Winter Retreat planning!
is watching The IT Crowd with Nate. British tv shows are awesome!
